plot outline: Set in the wilderness of Munnar, Orange Valley depicts the plight of exploited tea plantation workers, their rebellion under the communist leadership, consequent trade union strikes of 90's and the incursion of revolutionary Naxalite movement in the valley. People with their lives torn, still resilient and forgiving as the embodiments of love itself.
title: Orange Valley
plot: Set in the wilderness of Munnar, depicts the plight of the tea plantation workers, their rebellion under the communist leadership, the consequent trade union strikes of the 90's and the incursion of the revolutionary Naxalite movement.

Set in the wilderness of Munnar, _Orange Valley_ (qv) depicts the plight of exploited tea plantation workers, their rebellion under the communist leadership, consequent trade union strikes of 90's and the incursion of revolutionary Naxalite movement in the valley. People with their lives torn, still resilient and forgiving as the embodiments of love itself.
